capabilities.name: sequential-pipeline-debugging
capabilities.description: Debug optimization failures by walking through pipeline stages sequentially and stopping at the first failure found

capabilities.name: token-limit-awareness
capabilities.description: Know that OPTIMIZATION_CONTEXT_TOKEN_LIMIT and TESTGEN_CONTEXT_TOKEN_LIMIT are both 16000 tokens and that exceeding them causes function rejection

capabilities.name: improvement-threshold
capabilities.description: Know that MIN_IMPROVEMENT_THRESHOLD is 0.05 (5%) and candidates below this speedup are rejected

capabilities.name: ast-deduplication
capabilities.description: Know that candidates are deduplicated via AST normalization using normalize_code() and CandidateEvaluationContext.ast_code_to_id

capabilities.name: repair-trigger-conditions
capabilities.description: Know that repair only triggers when fewer than MIN_CORRECT_CANDIDATES=2 pass, and is skipped when REPAIR_UNMATCHED_PERCENTAGE_LIMIT is exceeded

capabilities.name: ai-service-error-patterns
capabilities.description: Know specific log patterns to search for when AI service fails: 'Error generating optimized candidates', 'cli-optimize-error-caught', 'cli-optimize-error-response'

capabilities.name: behavioral-vs-benchmark-failures
capabilities.description: Distinguish between behavioral test failures (return value/stdout/pass-fail mismatches via TestDiffScope) and benchmark failures (speedup below threshold)

capabilities.name: result-type-pattern
capabilities.description: Use Result[L, R] from either.py with Success/Failure constructors and is_successful() checks before unwrap()

capabilities.name: effort-config-pattern
capabilities.description: Add effort-dependent config via EffortKeys enum, EFFORT_VALUES dict with LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH levels, and get_effort_value()

capabilities.name: module-to-feature-mapping
capabilities.description: Know which codeflash module to modify for different feature types (optimization/ for strategies, api/ for endpoints, languages/ for language support, etc.)

capabilities.name: domain-type-conventions
capabilities.description: Use @dataclass(frozen=True) for immutable data, BaseModel for serializable models, and keep function_types.py dependency-free

capabilities.name: test-patterns
capabilities.description: Use tmp_path fixture, .resolve() on Paths, .as_posix() for string conversion, full string equality assertions, and awareness of deterministic patches

capabilities.name: quality-check-commands
capabilities.description: Run uv run prek run for formatting/linting, uv run mypy for type checking, and uv run pytest for tests

capabilities.name: language-support-patterns
capabilities.description: Use @register_language decorator, get_language_support() for lookup, singleton pattern via set_current_language()/current_language(), and is_python()/is_javascript() guards
